main event: Multiple UFO sightings occurred in Leighton, Alabama in the 1950s, including sightings of bright, metallic, disc-shaped objects, damaged spherical objects, and unidentified debris. Witnesses observed these objects hovering, accelerating at high speeds, and making sharp turns before disappearing from view.
interesting points: One witness reported observing a bright, metallic, disc-shaped object approximately 50 feet in diameter moving at a high rate of speed and making a sharp turn before disappearing.
A damaged or deformed spherical object, about 3 feet in diameter and made of transparent material, was observed, and the negative of the object was forwarded to the Air Force for analysis.
A bright, luminous, circular object emitting a bluish-white light and approximately 30 feet in diameter was observed ascending rapidly and then disappearing from sight.
A metallic object emitting a humming or buzzing sound, approximately 30 feet in diameter, was observed hovering in the sky and then accelerating at high speed before disappearing.
The Air Force classified one incident as 'unidentified' due to the high rate of speed at which the observed object disappeared.
sighted object: bright, metallic, disc-shaped objects, damaged spherical objects, and unidentified debris
